channel.title: Alone in my own zone
channel.description:
http://aloneinmyownzone.wordpress.com/
In my opinion, the distribution of child pornography should be legalized. Let me explain: Children were not molested to benefit me, the child porn was produced solely for profit or trading of new CP. My demand has NO effect on the number of children who are molested, as I collect it from the lowest of the food-chain.
[img]http://i481.photobucket.com/albums/rr180/brice42/Blank-Facepalm.gif[/img] You can't fix people. Discuss. inb4: FBI Operation

item.title: Alone in my own zone
item.dc:creator: @moparisthebest Moparisthebest
item.description:
@moparisthebest wrote:

One part of me would love to meet this guy so I could kill him. Another part wants to never meet this guy so I don’t have to kill him and go to jail for the rest of my life because of this asshole.

I think all pedos should have all their junk cut off, not just castrated, but the penis too. Then they wouldn’t have anything to get jollies with, bastards.

Read full topic

item.title: Alone in my own zone
item.dc:creator: @The_Reaper_X The Reaper X
item.description:
@The_Reaper_X wrote:

My demand has NO effect on the number of children who are molested, as I collect it from the lowest of the food-chain.
I don't know what he means by "from the lowest of the food-chain" but statistically he could easily be proven wrong. The majority of internet websites today contain adult content. Because of the activity they get, more and more are created every day. So... WHERESLOGIC???

Read full topic

The rest of it is insane ramblings or possibly a troll.

item.title: Alone in my own zone
item.dc:creator: @nade nade
item.description:
@nade wrote:

The not-so ordinary life of me.

The not-so ordinary life of me.

The side of paedophilia you never considered...

In my opinion, the distribution of child pornography should be legalized. Let me explain: Children were not molested to benefit me, the child porn was produced solely for profit or trading of new CP. My demand has NO effect on the number of children who are molested, as I collect it from the lowest of the food-chain.

You can’t fix people. Discuss.
inb4: FBI Operation
